name: Earline Zimmerman
about: If you could not select your machine you can take suggestions of them   they are best for choosing your best one

name: Tisha Bridges
about: Expansion mechanism secures the hidden tracker inside the handlebar, making it impossible to remove without the included special tools.

name: Gilliam Bailey
about: Quick and easy to mount with a flexible design, compatible with most handlebars (15mm – 23mm). Weighing only 52 g, you will not notice a change in your handlebars.

name: Mallory Perry
about: Unique triangulation technology shows your bike’s exact position. Get push notifications if your bike is moved.

name: Baldwin Dodson
about: With BikeFinder, I feel confident that I always know where my ebike is, and that it can be tracked if it disappears. With added insurance, I feel in complete control.

name: Nieves Albert
about: My BikeFinder led me to a storage room in an apt complex. My tracker helped the police find my bike! Highly recommend — especially if you've invested a lot of money in your bike.
